name: CP Testimonial
author: Creative pig

sections.description:
Show Testimonials, customer reviews and star ratings in a beautiful manner with the easy to set up Cp Testimonial Plugin. Built to give you a smooth user-experience
and enrich the overall look of your website.

View Demo

Features:

  • Fully Responsive and mobile ready
  • Add unlimited number of testimonials
  • Custom Settings including options Author image style, pagination on/off, typography, star ratings on/off, etc.
  • Auto Play Slider Available
  • Custom background image, color & styles available
  • Light Weight
  • Developer-friendly
  • Fast support plus Free Updates.
  • Choose round or square testimonial image
  • Star Ratings
  • Its easy to use interface allows you to manage, edit, create, and delete Testimonials with no new knowledge
  • Show all testimonials via a shortcode
  • Add testimonials to your site in seconds
  • Set a slider button style

Plugin Information and FAQs

Usage

Manual Insertion of Shortcode

  • To insert the estimonials, add new testimonials through the ‘Add New testimonial’ option, copy the shortcode generated and paste it in the page or post you want to
    add testimonials to.
sections.installation:
There are 3 ways to install this plugin:

1. The Easy Method

  1. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add
  2. Search for CP Testimonials
  3. Click to install
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. A new option under Settings menu named CP Testimonials will appear in your Admin

2. Install Through Zip File

  1. Download the plugin (.zip file) on the right column of this page
  2. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add
  3. Select the tab “Upload”
  4. Upload the .zip file you just downloaded
  5. Activate the plugin
  6. A new option under Settings menu named CP Testimonials will appear in your Admin

3. Through FTP

  1. Upload CP Testimonials folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. A new option under Settings menu named CP Testimonials will appear in your Admin
sections.faq:
I am a non-developer. Can I use the CP Testimonials Plugin?

Yes, anyone with or without technical skills can use the CP Testimonials Plugin and add beautiful testimonials to their websites.

Do I have to pay for using the CP Testimonials Plugin?

No, The CP Testimonials plugin is free to use. So you can simply download it and start using instantly.

Will there be any updates of CP Testimonials Plugin in the future?

Yes, we will soon come up with the updated versions of our CP Testimonials plugin.

First Version – no errors known as such.
